ygData.subject: Re: Tiny daggers
ygData.msgSnippet: It isn t tiny daggers. They are used by enchanters to make their pets. You are after Pine Needles. I don t know where they can be found. Personally I have only
ygData.messageBody:
It isn't tiny daggers. They are used by enchanters to make their pets. You are
after Pine Needles. I don't know where they can be found. Personally I have only
ever used arrows, and will continue to do so, even though my skill is 40 below
max.

Inos
Veeshan


Patrickje1@... wrote:

> From: Patrickje1@...
>
> Okies thanks fer help on freeport sk guild question just got one more
> question for you. I have realized how great archery can be expecially with
> our pets but when I went to use a tiny dagger as it uses archery skill though
> in the melee spot I couldnt equip it. So am I doing something wrong or did
> Verant change it so you cant use it anymore? Id really like to use it if
> possibe as getting it up with arrows will be time consuming and expensive.
>
> Gaukan
